# CompanyNext

Production-ready Next.js application for transparent company insights.

## Quick Start

See [README.md](./README.md) for full documentation.

## Repository

This is a standalone project for CompanyNext - a platform providing transparent company insights from public records and user reviews.

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 15 + TypeScript
- PostgreSQL + Prisma
- Clerk Authentication
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- pg-boss Background Jobs
